input.sentences: we took a trip today and saw many things including this poster for protests .
we saw a wall with written scripts on it .
many people were out and about on the streets .
there was even a lion dancing parade .
output.sentences: The trip was long, protests filled with citizens armed with posters everywhere.
Nearby were walls filled with scripts written long ago.
Solemn statues guarded the scenery as they moved along.
The local people took to the streets in preparation.
A colorful parade wound through the middle of everything, with lions, dragons, and dancing.
